ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Cream of Chicken Soup (Regular or 98% Fat Free)
Hot cooked regular long-grain white rice
n: Chicken Creole with Chile Cream Sauce
des: "Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Cream of Chicken Soup is kicked up with a festive blend of green chilies and lime, and served over tender chicken breasts dusted with Cajun seasoning and sauteed until done."
ins:
Season chicken with Creole seasoning.
Heat oil in skillet. Add chicken and cook until browned.
Add soup, water, chiles and lime juice. Heat to a boil. Cook over low heat 5 minutes or until done.
Stir in sour cream and heat through. Serve over rice.
